title: Juliette Binoche - Wikipedia
snippet: Juliette Binoche (French: [ʒyljɛt binɔʃ]; born 9 March 1964) is a French actress. She has appeared in more than 60 films, particularly in French and English, and has been the recipient of numerous accolades, including an Academy Award, a BAFTA Award, Volpi Cup and a César Award.

title: Juliette Binoche - Biography - IMDb
snippet: Daniel Auteuil and Juliette Binoche embody a Parisian couple whose life becomes a nightmare through anonymously sent videos. Privately, Binoche settled in Paris with her two children, Raphael and Hannah.

title: Juliette Binoche to be the new President ...
snippet: Wim Wenders succeeded him in 1996 and he served until 2020, followed by Holland, as the Academy’s first female President. The in January newly revamped Academy Board has now unequivocally proposed Juliette Binoche as new Academy President ...

title: Juliette Binoche Biography, Celebrity Facts and Awards - TV Guide
snippet: Unable to make a trip to visit former president Bill Clinton during his presidency after an invitation to the White House due to the success of the 2000 film "Chocolat," the Clintons came to New York to meet her
